sourcesContent:
Search Flights

{{flight.airline}}
Мест осталось {{flight.remainingNumberOfSeats}}
{{flight.departure.place}}
{{flight.departure.time | date}}
{{flight.departure.time | date:'shortTime'}}
{{flight.price}}
Book
{{flight.arrival.place}}
{{flight.arrival.time | date}}
{{flight.arrival.time | date:'shortTime'}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-search-flights', templateUrl: './search-flights.component.html', styleUrls: ['./search-flights.component.css'] }) export class SearchFlightsComponent { searchResult: FlightRm[] = [ { airline: "S7", arrival: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Novosibirsk" }, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Omsk" }, price: "8000", remainingNumberOfSeats:40, }, { airline: "UralAirlines", arrival: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Moscow" }, departure: { time: Date.now().toString(), place: "Omsk" }, price: "500", remainingNumberOfSeats: 20, } ] } export interface FlightRm { airline: string; arrival: TimePlaceRm; departure: TimePlaceRm; price: string; remainingNumberOfSeats: number; } export interface TimePlaceRm { place: string; time: string; }
